summary: Results-driven Logistics Architect with 15+ years of experience in deconstructing complex systems and re-architecting them for maximum efficiency, leveraging a unique blend of hands-on grit, psychological insight, and code-level technical ability.
skills_main: Automation & Scripting (Python, Selenium, Bash, REST API Integration, Regex, Web Scraping)
Systems Administration (Linux, Windows, Apache, Docker, Office 365 Admin, Active Directory)
Logistics Software (TMS, CRM, Load Boards, Fleet Tracking)
Security & Compliance (API Security, Vulnerability Analysis, DOT Regulations, KYC/AML Protocols, Food Safety)

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows, reducing manual administrative time by 40%
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments
Identified systemic bottlenecks in the manual scheduling process; designed and implemented a custom scheduling system that reduced downtime by 30% and improved fleet utilization

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College, Modesto, CA
